Translations.Text: Absolutely hoc est narration truth. Absolutely ibi non est deus absque DEUS! Absolutely DEUS est Almighty Wise
they turn tunc DEUS est fully aware de evildoers

dictus O followers scripture advenit logical agreement nos vos ut nos non worship DEUS nos nunquam set any idols Eum nor set any human beings dominus DEUS they turn dictus Bear testis nos est submitters
O followers scripture why vos argue Abraham when Torah Gospel non revealed dum post eum? Vos non understand
Vos argued circiter things vos habuit knew; vos argue things vos non know DEUS knows DUM VOS NON know
Abraham est nec Judaicus nor Christian he est monotheist submitter. He nunquam est idol worshiper
people dignus de Abraham est those subsequentis eum hoc prophet those believe DEUS est DOMINUS MAGISTER DE believers
Some followers scripture wish lead vos astray they unus lead astray sine perceiving
O followers scripture vos reject these revelations DEUS vos bear testis hoc est truth
